text: The Liga Portugal 2 (also known as Liga Portugal 2 SABSEG for sponsorship reasons) is the second division of football in Portugal. ==List of teams== ===Current=== *Académica *Académico de Viseu *Benfica B *Casa Pia *Chaves *Cova da Piedade *Estoril *Farense *Feirense *Mafra *Nacional *Oliveirense *Penafiel *Porto B *Sporting Covilhã *Varzim *Vilafranquense ==References== == Other websites == *Official webpage Category:1990 establishments in Europe Category:1990s establishments in Portugal Category:Football in Portugal Category:Football leagues in Europe
title: Liga Portugal 2
